verses.verse: And the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559>,
This month <WH2320> shall be unto you the beginning <WH7218> of months <WH2320>: it shall be the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> of the year to you <WH8141>.

Speak <WH1696> you unto all the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, In the tenth <WH6218> day of this month <WH2320> they shall take <WH3947> to them every man <WH376> a lamb <WH7716>, according to the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, a lamb <WH7716> for an house <WH1004>:

And if the household <WH1004> be <WH1961> too little <WH4591> for the lamb <WH7716>, let him and his neighbor <WH7934> next <WH7138> unto his house <WH1004> take <WH3947> it according to the number <WH4373> of the souls <WH5315>; every man <WH376> according <WH6310> to his eating <WH400> shall make your count <WH3699> for the lamb <WH7716>.
Your lamb <WH7716> shall be outside blemish <WH8549>, a male <WH2145> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141>: you shall take <WH3947> it out from the sheep <WH3532>, or from the goats <WH5795>:

And you shall keep <WH4931> it up until the fourteenth <WH702> day <WH3117> of the same month <WH2320>: and the whole <WH3605> assembly <WH6951> of the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478> shall kill <WH7819> it in <WH996> the evening <WH6153>.

And they shall take <WH3947> of the blood <WH1818>, and strike <WH5414> it on the two <WH8147> side posts <WH4201> and on the upper door post <WH4947> of the houses <WH1004>, where they shall eat it <WH398>.
And they shall eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> in that night <WH3915>, roast <WH6748> with fire <WH784>, and unleavened bread <WH4682>; and with bitter <WH4844> herbs they shall eat it <WH398>.

Eat <WH398> not of it raw <WH4995>, nor boiled <WH1310> at all with water <WH4325>, but roast <WH6748> with fire <WH784>; his head <WH7218> with his legs <WH3767>, and with the inner parts there <WH7130>.
And you shall let nothing of it remain <WH3498> until the morning <WH1242>; and that which remains <WH3498> of it until the morning <WH1242> you shall burn <WH8313> with fire <WH784>.

And thus <WH3602> shall you eat <WH398> it <WH4975>; with your waist belted <WH2296>, your shoes <WH5275> on your feet <WH7272>, and your staff <WH4731> in your hand <WH3027>; and you shall eat <WH398> it in hurry <WH2649>: it is the Lord <WH3068>'s passover <WH6453>.

For I will pass <WH5674> through the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> this night <WH3915>, and will strike <WH5221> all the firstborn <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, both man <WH120> and animal <WH929>; and against all the gods <WH430> of Egypt <WH4714> I will execute <WH6213> judgment <WH8201>: I am the Lord <WH3068>.

And the blood <WH1818> shall be to you for a token <WH226> upon the houses <WH1004> where you are <WH7200>: and when I see the blood <WH1818>, I will pass <WH6452> over you <WH5063>, and the plague shall not be upon you to destroy <WH4889> you <WH5221>, when I strike the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And this day <WH3117> shall be unto you for a memorial <WH2146>; and you shall keep <WH2287> it a feast <WH2282> to the Lord <WH3068> throughout your generations <WH1755>; you shall keep it a feast <WH2287> by an ordinance <WH2708> for ever <WH5769>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall you eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>; even <WH389> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> you shall put away <WH7673> yeast <WH7603> out of your houses <WH1004>: for whoever eat <WH398> leavened bread <WH2557> from the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> until the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off from Israel <WH3478>.

And in the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> there shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>, and in the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> there shall be an holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> to you <WH4399>; no manner of work shall be done <WH6213> in them <WH389>, save that which every man <WH5315> must eat <WH398>, that only may be done of you <WH6213>.

And you shall observe <WH8104> the feast of unleavened bread <WH4682>; for in this same <WH6106> day <WH3117> have I brought <WH3318> your armies <WH6635> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: therefore shall you observe <WH8104> this day <WH3117> in your generations <WH1755> by an ordinance <WH2708> for ever <WH5769>.

In the first <WH7223> month <WH6240>, on the fourteenth day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> at even <WH6153>, you shall eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>, until the one <WH259> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> at even <WH6153>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall there be no yeast <WH7603> found <WH4672> in your houses <WH1004>: for whoever eat <WH398> that which is leavened <WH2556>, even that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478>, whether he be a stranger <WH1616>, or born <WH249> in the land <WH776>.
You shall eat <WH398> nothing leavened <WH2556>; in all your habitations <WH4186> shall you eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>.

Then Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> for all the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>, and said <WH559> unto them <WH4900>, Draw out and take <WH3947> you a lamb <WH6629> according to your families <WH4940>, and kill <WH7819> the passover <WH6453>.

And you shall take <WH3947> a bunch <WH92> of hyssop <WH231>, and dip <WH2881> it in the blood <WH1818> that is in the basin <WH5592>, and strike <WH5060> the lintel <WH4947> and the two <WH8147> side posts <WH4201> with the blood <WH1818> that is in the basin <WH5592>; and none <WH376> of you shall go out <WH3318> at the door <WH6607> of his house <WH1004> until the morning <WH1242>.

For the Lord <WH3068> will pass through <WH5674> to strike <WH5062> the Egyptians <WH4714>; and when he sees <WH7200> the blood <WH1818> upon the lintel <WH4947>, and on the two <WH8147> side posts <WH4201>, the Lord <WH3068> will pass over <WH6452> the door <WH6607>, and will not allow <WH5414> the destroyer <WH7843> to come <WH935> in unto your houses <WH1004> to strike you <WH5062>.
And you shall observe <WH8104> this thing <WH1697> for an ordinance <WH2706> to you and to your sons <WH1121> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.

And it shall come to pass <WH935>, when you be come to the land <WH776> which the Lord <WH3068> will give <WH5414> you <WH1696>, according as he has promised, that you shall keep <WH8104> this service <WH5656>.
And it shall come to pass <WH1121>, when your sons shall say <WH559> unto you <WH5656>, What mean you by this service?

That you shall say <WH559>, It is the sacrifice <WH2077> of the Lord <WH3068>'s passover <WH6453>, who passed <WH6452> over the houses <WH1004> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in Egypt <WH4714>, when he struck <WH5062> the Egyptians <WH4714>, and delivered <WH5337> our houses <WH1004>. And the people <WH5971> bowed the head <WH6915> and worshiped <WH7812>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went away <WH3212>, and did <WH6213> as the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>, so did they <WH6213>.

And it came to pass <WH2677>, that at midnight the Lord <WH3068> struck <WH5221> all the firstborn <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the firstborn <WH1060> of Pharaoh <WH6547> that sat <WH3427> on his throne <WH3678> unto the firstborn <WH1060> of the captive <WH7628> that was in the dungeon <WH1004>; and all the firstborn <WH1060> of cattle <WH929>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> rose up <WH6965> in the night <WH3915>, he <WH5650>, and all his servants, and all the Egyptians <WH4714>; and there was a great <WH1419> cry <WH6818> in Egypt <WH4714>; for there was not a house <WH1004> where there was not one dead <WH4191>.

And he called <WH7121> for Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> by night <WH3915>, and said <WH559>, Rise up <WH6965>, and get you forth <WH3318> from among <WH8432> my people <WH5971>, both you and the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and go <WH3212>, serve <WH5647> the Lord <WH3068>, as you have said <WH1696>.
Also take <WH3947> your flocks <WH6629> and your herds <WH1241>, as you have said <WH1696>, and be gone <WH3212>; and bless me also <WH1288>.

And the Egyptians <WH4714> were urgent <WH2388> with the people <WH5971>, that they might send <WH7971> them out of the land <WH776> in hurry <WH4116>; for they said <WH559>, We be all dead men <WH4191>.

And the people <WH5971> took <WH5375> their dough <WH1217> before it was leavened <WH2556>, their kneadingtroughs <WH4863> being bound up <WH6887> in their clothes <WH8071> upon their shoulders <WH7926>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> according to the word <WH1697> of Moses <WH4872>; and they borrowed <WH7592> of the Egyptians <WH4714> jewels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, and jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, and clothes <WH8071>:

And the Lord <WH3068> gave <WH5414> the people <WH5971> favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, so that they lent <WH7592> unto them such things as they required <WH5337>. And they spoiled the Egyptians <WH4714>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265> from Rameses <WH7486> to Succoth <WH5523>, about six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> on foot <WH7273> that were men <WH1397>, beside <WH905> sons <WH2945>.
And a mixed <WH6154> multitude <WH7227> went up <WH5927> also with them <WH6629>; and flocks, and herds <WH1241>, even very <WH3966> much <WH3515> cattle <WH4735>.

And they baked <WH644> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH5692> of the dough <WH1217> which they brought forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714>, for it was not leavened <WH2556>; because they were thrust out <WH1644> of Egypt <WH4714>, and could <WH3201> not stay <WH4102>, neither had they prepared <WH6213> for themselves any food <WH6720>.
Now the staying <WH4186> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, who lived <WH3427> in Egypt <WH4714>, was four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141>.

And it came to pass at the end <WH7093> of the four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141>, even the same <WH6106> day <WH3117> it came to pass <WH6635>, that all the hosts of the Lord <WH3068> went out <WH3318> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

It is a night <WH3915> to be much observed <WH8107> unto the Lord <WH3068> for bringing <WH3318> them out from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: this is that night <WH3915> of the Lord <WH3068> to be observed <WH8107> of all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in their generations <WH1755>.
And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>, This is the ordinance <WH2708> of the passover <WH6453>: There shall no stranger <WH1121> eat there <WH398>
But every man <WH376>'s servant <WH5650> that is bought <WH4736> for money <WH3701>, when you have circumcised <WH4135> him <WH398>, then shall he eat there
A foreigner <WH8453> and an hired servant <WH7916> shall not eat there <WH398>

In one <WH259> house <WH1004> shall it be eaten <WH398>; you shall not carry forth <WH3318> anything of the flesh <WH1320> abroad <WH2351> out of the house <WH1004>; neither shall you break <WH7665> a bone there <WH6106>
All the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478> shall keep it <WH6213>.

And when a stranger <WH1616> shall stay <WH1481> with you and will keep <WH6213> the passover <WH6453> to the Lord <WH3068>, let all his males <WH2145> be circumcised <WH4135>, and then let him come near <WH7126> and keep <WH6213> it <WH249>; and he shall be as one that is born in the land <WH776>: for no uncircumcised person <WH6189> shall eat there <WH398>
One <WH259> law <WH8451> shall be to him that is homeborn <WH249>, and unto the stranger <WH1616> that stays <WH1481> among you <WH8432>.
Thus did <WH6213> all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>, so did they <WH6213>.
And it came to pass the same <WH6106> day <WH3117>, that the Lord <WH3068> did bring <WH3318> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> by their armies <WH6635>.
